name: Unnamed Board Game
description:
Overview

In this two-player hot seat game, each player first places a cannon somewhere on the board. After the placement phase, each turn a player can either:

a) move their cannon to a different position
b) try and shoot the enemy cannon

Players win by sinking the other cannon into the sea or by hitting the other cannon 3 times. However, the wind needs to be taken into consideration as it influences the cannonball trajectory significantly.

Controls

Mouse Cursor --> Select initial position / move your cannon
Right Mouse Button --> Rotate the game board
"W" and "D" or Arrow-Keys --> Rotate/Aim your cannon
Space bar --> Build up power for your cannonball shot
Mouse Scroll --> Zoom closer to the board
Escape (ESC) --> Exit the game

Credits

Code, models and concept by Jérôme Wagener
Unity Personal 2020.3.16f1

Music by Andrey Sitkov
Licensed via Retro Casual Music Pack (Humble Bundle: Big Music 2)

Font "Germania" by John Vargas Beltran
Licensed via Open Font License

Sound Effects from:
Humble Music & Sound Effects for Games, Films,
and Content Creators Bundle Part 2
